price: Those who disbelieve will have a severe punishment, but those who believe and do righteous deeds will have forgiveness and a great reward.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ شَدِيدٞۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَأَجۡرٞ كَبِيرٌ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alladhīna kafarū lahum ʿadhābun shadīdun wa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun kabīrun
